PathOfBuilding.Notes:
CoC Breakpoints:
Cooldown Recovery Speed: Low Breakpoint: 14% or above High Breakpoint: 52% or above (only achievable with Awakened Cast on Crit and works ONLY for the link, not for Cospri)
Cyclone Attack Speed (hit the exact value or go below that value if you DO NOT HAVE ANY OTHER MORE MULTIPLIER ON CYCLONE ATTACK SPEED):
---Single Cospri:--- Low CD Breakpoint: 7.57 Attacks per Second (with Elusive in attack speed calculation)
without Elusive in attack speed calculation: 8% Cospri - 6.75 ApS 9% Cospri - 6.73 ApS 10% Cospri - 6.76 ApS 11% Cospri - 6.73 ApS 12% Cospri - 6.71 ApS 13% Cospri - too high in this specific build 14% Cospri - too high in this specific build
||||||||||||||||||||||||||||| BELOW THIS LINE ARE OLD CALCULATIONS FROM PRE 3.10 (20% elusive), JUST GET THE PoB FORK!!! ||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||
High CD Breakpoint (actually only useful when dual wielding cospri): 10.10 Attacks per Second (with Elusive in attack speed calculation)
without Elusive in attack speed calculation: 8% Cospri - 9.03 ApS 9% Cospri - 9.03 ApS 10% Cospri - 9.03 ApS 11% Cospri - 9.02 ApS 12% Cospri - 9.02 ApS 13% Cospri - 9.01 ApS 14% Cospri - 9.01 ApS
---Double Cospri:--- Low CD Breakpoint: 15.15 Attacks per Second (with Elusive in attack speed calculation)
without Elusive in attack speed calculation (both Cospri's should have the same attack speed to avoid the case of one weapon above and the other below the breakpoint): 8% Cospris - 14.00 ApS 9% Cospris - 13.95 ApS 10% Cospris - 13.99 ApS 11% Cospris - 13.97 ApS 12% Cospris - 13.94 ApS 13% Cospris - 13.92 ApS 14% Cospris - 13.94 ApS
High CD Breakpoint: 20.20 Attacks per Second (with Elusive in attack speed calculation)
without Elusive in attack speed calculation (both Cospri's should have the same attack speed to avoid the case of one weapon above and the other below the breakpoint): 8% Cospris - 19.01 ApS 9% Cospris - 19.00 ApS 10% Cospris - 19.04 ApS 11% Cospris - 19.03 ApS 12% Cospris - 18.96 ApS 13% Cospris - 18.99 ApS 14% Cospris - 18.98 ApS
